title: 761: BITCOIN WILL EXPLODE TO $1 MILLION AND ETHEREUM $100,000, NO DOUBT, SAYS BILLION-DOLLAR CEO!!
description:
The CEO of an investment firm with $4.6 billion in assets under management is predicting that the Bitcoin price will hit seven figures while Ethereum will reach six.

U.S. Global Investors head Frank Holmes says that, due to Bitcoin’s scarcity and growing adoption, the flagship cryptocurrency can appreciate by around 1,600% from current levels over the next decade.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
